str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To bring to an end, fulfill, accomplish. From sun and teleo; to complete entirely; generally, to execute.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From sun and the base of tomoteros; to contract by cutting, i.e. do concisely.
